title: Son of Norway’s crown princess arrested on new charges before start of rape trial
summary_full: Marius Borg Høiby arrested on suspicion of assault, making threats with knife and violating restraining order, police sayThe son of Norway’s crown princess, Marius Borg Høiby, has been arrested on new charges just days before the start of his rape trial.The Oslo police district said Høiby had been arrested on Sunday evening on suspicion of assault, making threats with a knife and violating a restraining order. Continue reading...
